title: Emerald Vaala - A Timeless Green and Gold Bangle Set
features: Openable Kadiyam design for easy wear. Features a linear arrangement of oval-cut Emeralds alternating with intricate rows of sparkling Cubic Zirconia. The gold framework boasts a delicate filigree design on the edges, reflecting traditional South Indian craftsmanship. Features an Openable design.
colors: Predominantly Gold with vibrant Green Emeralds and dazzling White Cubic Zirconia.
occasions: or any special occasion. The elegant design makes it suitable for both traditional and contemporary attire.
description: A blend of traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality Emeralds and gold ensures lasting value. The Hyderabadi polish gives the bangle a rich and lustrous finish. A symbol of prosperity and elegance, ideal as a cherished heirloom (varasatvam).
